text:
At Johnson Controls, we’re shaping the future to create a world that’s safe, comfortable and sustainable. Our global team creates innovative, integrated solutions to make cities more connected, buildings more intelligent and vehicles more efficient. We are passionate about improving the way the world lives, works and plays. The future requires bold ideas, an entrepreneurial mind-set and collaboration across boundaries. You need a career focused on tomorrow. Tomorrow needs you.
Business Development Manager (M/W/D) Security Systems
What you will do:
Understand and discuss the Sales plan with the Sales leader to agree on potential major opportunities to be chased in focus area (entire Swiss)
Qualify major opportunities to be further pursued, drive consistency between Sales strategy
You will b At Johnson Controls, we’re shaping the future to create a world that’s safe, comfortable and sustainable. Our global team creates innovative, integrated solutions to make cities more connected, buildings more intelligent and vehicles more efficient. We are passionate about improving the way the world lives, works and plays. The future requires bold ideas, an entrepreneurial mind-set and collaboration across boundaries. You need a career focused on tomorrow. Tomorrow needs you.
Business Development Manager (M/W/D) Security Systems
What you will do:
Understand and discuss the Sales plan with the Sales leader to agree on potential major opportunities to be chased in focus area (entire Swiss)
Qualify major opportunities to be further pursued, drive consistency between Sales strategy
You will be a key face of the Tyco relationship to the clients you are responsible for, covering many layers within the organization and be able to develop relationships at the Executive level.
You will be expert in demand generation activities that are relevant to this market segment (Security systems) and will play a lead role in devising strategies to promote Tyco in these forums with tangible business results.
Focus on bringing cross-portfolio opportunities to our existing customer base and ensure client satisfaction.
What we are looking for:
Technical degree or technical apprenticeship with appropriate further training
Many years of professional experience in technical sales of equipment and systems requiring explanation, ideally in the field of security systems, building services engineering
Proven sales and/or client relationship management experience
Ability to work with cross functional teams in order to achieve customer objectives
Fluent language skills in German, French and English mandatory
Interested?
Please apply via our website or send your complete application to Erza Musliu (erza.musliu@jci.com).
